ARABIC: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have taken gods besides Allah so that perhaps they may be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And take other gods apart from God that they may perhaps give them help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They set up deities apart from Allah, hoping that they will receive help from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They chose idols besides God in the hope of receiving help from them, but they will not be able to help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they have appointed Gods other than Allah, that perhaps they may be helped!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they have taken besides Allah, gods, hoping that they might be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they have taken gods besides Allah that they may be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yet they have taken, apart from God, gods; haply they might be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they have taken (other) gods beside Allah, in order that they may be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They have set up other gods besides God, hoping to be helped by them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they have taken beside Allah gods, hoping that haply they may be succoured.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They have taken gods besides Allah, [hoping] that they might be helped [by the fake deities].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they have taken besides Allah aliha (gods), hoping that they might be helped (by those so called gods).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And yet they have taken gods, other than Allah, so that they might helped!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet they have taken to themselves gods other than God, that perhaps they may be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:74] And they have taken besides God, in other words, other than Him, [other] gods, idols, which they worship, that perhaps they might be helped, protected against God’s chastisement by their gods’ interceding for them, as they are wont to claim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they have) and the disbelievers of Mecca worshipped ((other) gods) idols (beside Allah, in order that they may be helped) so that they may save them from Allah's punishment.
